Posts.Content: LL8251 wrote: I am on my way to my dr's right now.  I discovered a thickening of the skin on my breast.  It does not seem like a big area it looks red to me but when I put my arm up it is white.  But there is definetly something there.  It does not feel like a lump. Has anyone had anything similar.  I am new to this and been reading on the Internet, it does not sound good what I have been reading.  I recently just lost a lot of weight which I was on a program for.  I thought maybe that had something to do with it. Thanks. LL Log in to post a reply
